subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Devin Harris made 14 free throws and scored 28 points in the Nets’ buzzer-to-buzzer unwrapping of the Nuggets at the Izod Center on Saturday.
snippet: Devin Harris made 14 free throws and scored 28 points in the Nets’ buzzer-to-buzzer unwrapping of the Nuggets at the Izod Center on Saturday.
